body:
Has anybody tried using Paypal's IPN on a port other than 80? 

I'm trying to specify a URL like [http://domain.com:8080/url/to/ipn.php](http://domain.com:8080/url/to/ipn.php) but the IPN request isn't getting through.

If I hit the URL directly from my browser it works fine.
title: PayPal IPN on port other than 80
